title: Software as a Service for Cardano
description: Developers need to deploy infrastructure to communicate with Cardano. This time-consuming and costly task stops the development of new ideas
solution: Provide a highly available and scalable software infrastructure (APIs/SDKs) for developers to build on top of Cardano reducing time and cost
experience: We're a team with more than 10 years of experience in the software industry. We operate the **TANGO** stake pool and developed **cardano-wallet-js**
